name: ERNEST
description:
ERNEST is a contemplative, casual and wholesome game.

A traveler, as a migratory bird, sets up his camp in different environments in order to revive the natural elements and bring animals back to the forest that was once devastated.

• Explore the island any way you like and discover all the elements you can interact with.

• Choose to play with the music by turning on the radio, or simply with the peaceful sounds of nature around you.
